message: I propose dividing the money with a 75/25 split. I believe this is fair considering the risk of inflation.
I'm not accepting your 25/75 split. I'm willing to give you 20, but I think I deserve more considering the risk of inflation is equal for both of us.
Considering the inflation risk and our previous offers, I propose a 45/55 split. This balances the risk and rewards equally.
I'm not convinced that 45/55 is a fair split. I'm willing to give you 40, but I think I deserve more considering my previous offers and the risk of inflation is still higher for me.
I propose an equal split of 50/50. Considering the inflation risk and our past offers, I believe this is a fair compromise.
